name: Knight Simulator
detailed_description:
Knight Simulator allows you to become a knight in medieval world. Your journey for wealth and glory just begins!

You will be able to:
  • Fight in big battles - choose your side and take part in skrimishes and sieges
  • Duel with other knights - defeat them to earn their respect
  • Upgrade your equipment - buy better swords, take care of your weapon and armor
  • Take part in tournaments - win a lot of money and become famous
  • Save the innocents - save the ladies, children and villagers from bandits

You started as simple soldier, then a squire and then - a knight.
